articles.title: Coronavirus: NHS COVID app failed to record potential exposures due to error - Sky News

articles.author: Chanel Georgina
articles.title: Hair loss treatment: The best breakfast to encourage hair growth - Express
articles.description: HAIR LOSS is influenced by age, health, genetics and diet. You may not have control over all of these factors, but you most definitely can dictate your diet. Choosing a good breakfast could encourage hair growth.

articles.title: How to live longer: The 15-minute activity that could extend your lifespan - Express
articles.description: HOW TO live longer: Time tumbles on, whether you want it to or not. If you'd like to extend your lifespan, one daily 15-minute activity could do just that.
